nodes.text: Battle of Hoth Continues is an article written by J. W. Rinzler that appeared in Star Wars Insider 115. The article was a continuation of Rinzler's previous article The Battle of Hoth which appeared in Star Wars Insider 114. Battle of Hoth Continues featured more storyboards from the battle, focusing on the part where Luke Skywalker destroys an All Terrain Armored Transport by throwing a landmine inside a hole he made with his lightsaber.
